tit.cmt: 数字をスペルアウトしました。

sen.j: 古劇八種（こげき はっしゅ）は、市川團蔵 (6代目)が撰じた三河屋 (歌舞伎)・市川團蔵のお家芸。
sen.e: Kogeki hasshu is a family's specialty of Danzo ICHIKAWA, Mikawaya (Kabuki), that Danzo ICHIKAWA VI had picked out.
Kogeki hasshu is a family's specialty (iegei) of Danzo ICHIKAWA, Mikawaya (Kabuki), that Danzo ICHIKAWA VI had picked out.
sen.cmt: 家芸の日本語を補足しました。
sen.e: Kogeki hasshu is a family's specialty (iegei) of Danzo ICHIKAWA, Mikawaya (Kabuki), that Danzo ICHIKAWA VI had picked out.

sen.j: 市川團蔵 (初代)の当たり役といわれるが、仔細は不明。
sen.e: Although they are said to be star roles of Danzo ICHIKAWA I, their details are unknown.
Although they are said to be star roles of Danzo ICHIKAWA I, their details are unknown.
Although they are said to be star roles of Danzo ICHIKAWA I, their details are unknown.

sen.j: 歌舞伎研究家の渥美清太郎は、いくつかの演目は荒事に関するものではないかと推測している。
sen.e: Seitaro ATSUMI, a kabuki critic, conjectures that some of the programs are in connection with aragoto (Kabuki play featuring exaggerated posture, makeup, and costume).
Seitaro ATSUMI, a kabuki critic, conjectures that some of the programs are related to aragoto (Kabuki play featuring exaggerated posture, makeup, and costume).
Seitaro ATSUMI, a kabuki critic, conjectures that some of the programs are related to aragoto (Kabuki play featuring exaggerated posture, makeup, and costume).

sen.j: 剃立暫（そりたて しばらく）
鬼打豆 (歌舞伎)（おにうちまめ）
sen.cmt: バグで出てきたらしき語を除きました。

sen.j: 白髪秀郷（しらが ひでさと）

sen.cmt: バグで出てきたらしき語を除きました。

sen.j: 大森彦七 (歌舞伎)（おおもり ひこしち）
sen.cmt: バグで出てきたらしき語を除きました。

sen.j: 輿破り（こし やぶり）

sen.cmt: バグで出てきたらしき語を除きました。
